title: White platelegs

properties.name: description
properties.value: White platelegs are a type of White Knight armour that are members only. To wear white platelegs, the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence. One can either buy them for 1920 coins from Sir Vyvin (with the Novice rank) or trade with another player. They have similar bonuses to black platelegs but have an additional +1 Prayer bonus, and have the same stats as a white plateskirt but weigh more. As with all white armour, it cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

Item ID6625

White platelegs are a type of White Knight armour that are members only. To wear white platelegs, the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence. One can either buy them for 1920 coins from Sir Vyvin (with the Novice rank) or trade with another player. They have similar bonuses to black platelegs but have an additional +1 Prayer bonus, and have the same stats as a white plateskirt but weigh more. As with all white armour, it cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

[[File:White platelegs detail.png|left|90px]]
'''White platelegs''' are a type of [[White Knight equipment|White Knight]] [[armour]] that are [[members only]]. To wear white platelegs, the player must have completed the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]] and have at least 10 [[Defence]]. One can either buy them for 1920 coins from [[Sir Vyvin]] (with the Novice [[White Knight rank|rank]]) or trade with another player. They have similar bonuses to [[black platelegs]] but have an additional +1 [[Prayer]] bonus, and have the same stats as a [[white plateskirt]] but weigh more. As with all [[white armour]], it cannot be made using the [[Smithing]] skill.
